summary:
Huawei is a Chinese technology company that makes telecom equipment, consumer electronics, and more. Founded in 1987, it started with phone switches and grew to become the world's top telecom equipment maker. It also makes smartphones and surpassed Apple and Samsung in this market.

Huawei has faced controversy due to concerns about its ties to the Chinese government and possible surveillance. Some countries have restricted or banned its products. The company has denied spying allegations but has faced legal issues and sanctions, especially from the United States.
title: Huawei
